jobs_results.title: Programista Android Mobile Developer (Android) (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
Czym będziesz się zajmować?
• uczestnictwo w projekcie bankowym. Praca ze stosem technologiczny: Kotlin, Dagger, Compose-ui,
• projektowanie i rozwój nowych funkcjonalności,
• utrzymanie obecnego rozwiązania,
• współpraca z zespołem deweloperskim w metodyce scrum,
• praca zdalna z okazjonalnymi wizytami w biurze (Warszawa, Wrocław, Poznań)
• stawka: do 120zł/h + VAT.

Kogo poszukujemy?
• posiadasz min. 3-letnie doświadczenie na podobnym stanowisku,
• posiadasz komercyjne doświadczenie w pracy z Kotlin,
• znasz Coroutines, Dagger, Compose-ui,
• posiadasz znajomość j. angielskiego na poziomie pozwalającym pracę z dokumentacją techniczną,
• mile widziane: doświadczenie w projektach bankowych.nbsp;

Czego wymagamy?

3 lata doświadczenia na podobnym stanowisku
Znajomości:
• Dagger
• Kotlin
• Coroutines
• Compose-ui
Języki:
• Polski
• Angielski

Jakie warunki i benefity otrzymasz?
• 16800-20200 PLN miesięcznie
• B2B - Elastyczne godziny pracy (100%)
• Praca zdalna: Możliwa w całości
• Budżet szkoleniowy, Szkolenia wewnętrzne, Wyjazdy na konferencje, Klasy językowe
• Pakiet medyczny, Ubezpieczenie, Pakiet sportowy

Kim jesteśmy?
We are a leading European IT company supporting your business growth with tailored software solutions, skilled development teams, and expert consulting

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer (iOS + Android)  with German
jobs_results.description: Kyotu Technology is looking for Mobile Developer (iOS + Android) with German

jobs_results.title: Senior Android App Developer
jobs_results.description:
Our client is a global leader in Sportsbook and Online Casino and they are now looking at scaling up their European operations. They're seeking an experienced Senior Android App Developer to join their team.

Responsibilities:

• Develop features that can be readily tested and scaled, and analyze other engineers' work based on that attitude

• Work cooperatively with a team of experienced engineers in a fast-paced environment

• Maintain ongoing communication with team members and other stakeholders in order to match technical solutions to business goals, which may need attending product meetings and speaking up about the technical side of the story.

• Contribute technical skills to feature design and act as a code and product quality watchdog.

• Participate in task planning and estimation with your team.

• Be in charge of the development process from start to finish, including prototype, validation, implementation, launch, and iteration.

• Improve the codebase on a regular basis, discover bottlenecks, and share your suggestions for improving development efficiency with the team.

• Create an application that is failsafe, high-quality, and responsive.

Requirements:

• 4-6 years of experience building Android applications in a variety of disciplines is required.

• Strong knowledge of Kotlin and JVM

• Knowledge of how to write code that is elegant, manageable, legible, and tested

• Strong communication, collaboration, and problem-solving abilities; ability to confidently defend your technical conclusions to other team members

• Having a thorough grasp of the benefits and drawbacks of various architectures and design patterns (Singleton, Builder, Factory, Strategy, and so on), as well as knowing how and when to use them.

Our client and its brands are equal opportunity employers committed to hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive culture. The client does not discriminate on the basis of disability, veteran status, or any other basis protected under federal, state, or local laws.

jobs_results.title: Senior Kotlin and Swift Developer
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a Senior Kotlin and Swift Developer who will be responsible for developing and maintaining mobile apps on both Android and iOS platforms. You will work closely with developers, designers, and product managers to ensure the app is efficient, reliable, and user-friendly.

Work at Exadel - Who We Are Since 1998, Exadel has been engineering its products and custom software for clients of all sizes. Headquartered in Walnut Creek, California, Exadel has 2,800+ employees in development centers across America, Europe, and Asia. Our people drive Exadel’s success and are at the core of our values.

About the CustomerOur client is passionate about making the world more accessible using our state-of-the-art tech, which is made for consumers and enterprises, and working on a life-changing product - the best phone call captioning application. The team treats the application as its own. Transparency is another important factor.

Requirements• Background in mobile app development with Kotlin and Swift
• Understanding of Android and iOS development ecosystems
• Experience with state management and testing frameworks
• Problem-solving skills and attention to detail
• Passionate about building inclusive, user-focused applications
• A team player who values transparency, collaboration, and mutual support

Nice to HaveFamiliarity with cross-platform development using React Native

English levelFluent

Responsibilities• Develop and maintain mobile applications using Kotlin for Android and Swift for iOS
• Collaborate with a cross-functional team, including backend developers, to integrate mobile apps with Golang-based microservices
• Optimize native modules for handling audio and calls, ensuring smooth and efficient communication for users
• Write clean, maintainable, and testable code, following best practices in mobile development
• Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and promoting high-quality standards
• Contribute to the continuous improvement of our development processes and tools
• Tech stack: Kotlin, Swift, React Native, Golang, Microservices, OpenAPI, Zustand, React Query, React Native Testing Library, Maestro

Advantages of Working with ExadelTransparent Career Roadmap• Your career growth is in your hands, so each Exadeller decides when to level up and initiate performance assessments
• The employee has a formal salary review once a year

Learning & Development Opportunities• We believe in nurturing talent and fostering growth. That's why we budget every year for your continuous learning journey. From professional development courses to books and certification, we're invested in your success
• Polish language lessons with a native speaker are fully covered, and English lessons for $2 gross per lesson are available for Exadel language learners
• Every specialist gets free access to the Coursera Education platform

Work-Life Balance• Operating from the office or remotely is an employee's choice. Hybrid or remote employees will receive all necessary equipment at their home addresses before their first working day. The office network in Warsaw, Poznan, Gdansk, Szczecin, Bialystok, Krakow, and Lublin, is open daily for those who prefer to work in office
• The team meets at two annual team-building events across locations; in addition there are team events such as Pizza Days, Programmer’s Day, informal meetups, board game parties, and sports initiatives

Employee’s Perks & Bonuses• Exadellers have access to Worksmile platforms for Multisport compensation, medical insurance packages in Luxmed or Medicover centers, and online stores and services
• We understand the importance of balancing work and personal life. Exadellers who take 14 vacation calendar days or more receive a gross extra payment of 1,550 PLN. In case of childbirth, the employee receives a 2,000 PLN bonus, gross
• The Exadel referral program involves recognition for hired recommended professionals. Depending on the position of the hired recommended candidate, each employee receives a gross monetary bonus from 1,000 PLN to 6,500 PLN

jobs_results.title: Lead Android Engineer (#35)
jobs_results.description:
Work type: Office/Remote Technical Level: Leader Job Category: Software Development Project:

We are looking for Lead Android Engineer to join our team.

We are looking for a skilled Lead Android developer to join our Product team. The best suitable candidate is ready to face challenges, participate in solution-making, and handle tasks independently while working as a team.
Main Responsibilities:
• To lead Android team responsible for developing and supporting kiosk-like APP
• Collaborate with the Team, PM, PО, Designer, BA, and other stakeholders to develop roadmaps and features to delight our product
• Sharing your expertise and the value they can bring to the business
• Handle team members' growth as engineers by improving internal team processes and mentoring
• Curious and passionate about finding creative solutions to complex problems
• Be able to deal with issues and feel a deep need to share the experience with others
• Building technology in the right direction: for us, this means simple, organized, well-tested systems that gradually grow over time, and that provides plenty of insight into production performance

Role Requirements:
• 6-7+ years of enterprise with Kotlin
• 1+ years of experience in Android Lead role
• Experience in AOSP and OTA
• Experience in Android development with the latest Android SDKs and Material Design concepts
• Experience in Embedded based projects of at least 3-4 years
• Experience with Android OTA would be a great advantage
• Experience with BT/Wi-Fi connection would be a great advantage
• Experience in Agile development
• Strong understanding of SDLC
• Upper-intermediate English level

The ideal candidate is also:
• Has an Agile mindset and is a good team player
• Collaborative but decisive personal style
• Highly effective communicator and problem solver
• Is able to analyze, plan and estimate requirements as well as identify risks involved and provide solutions to them

We offer:
• Flexible working format - remote, office-based or flexible
• A competitive salary and good compensation package
• Personalized career growth
• Professional development tools (mentorship program, tech talks and trainings, centers of excellence, and more)
• Active tech communities with regular knowledge sharing
• Education reimbursement
• Paid vacation days, sick leaves, and days off
• Healthcare & Sport program
• Medical insurance
• Memorable anniversary presents
• Corporate events and team buildings

jobs_results.title: Android Automotive Software Engineer @ Spyrosoft
jobs_results.description:
100% home office possibility with occasional trips to Berlin.

For our clients from the Automotive industry, we are seeking Android Automotive Software Engineer willing to work in the area of the autonomous premium cars. We are building various teams focused on a driver monitoring system. The aim of the project is to ensure the reliability, scalability, and performance of our Yocto image building process and development of AAOS. As AAOS expert you will be building emulator image for multi platforms (X86_64, ARM or cloud based any other).

If you meet the requirements and are passionate about the DevOps role, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume!
• Strong knowledge of AOSP build system, Android framework, Android booting and system partitioning (MUST)
• Knowledge of system services, system applications, HAL implementation and extension (MUST)
• Solid knowledge of virtualization technologies used in Android such as virtIO, kvm, Qemu, crosvm (MUST)
• Proficiency in Yocto Project, AAOS
• Experience with Android Studio, Java, Kotlin, Python and native code (C++)
• Experience in source control tools like Git, repo
• Experience in the use of JIRA/Confluence/GitLab in product environment
• English – minimum B1

100% home office possibility with occasional trips to Berlin.

For our clients from the Automotive industry, we are seeking Android Automotive Software Engineer willing to work in the area of the autonomous premium cars. We are building various teams focused on a driver monitoring system. The aim of the project is to ensure the reliability, scalability, and performance of our Yocto image building process and development of AAOS. As AAOS expert you will be building emulator image for multi platforms (X86_64, ARM or cloud based any other).

If you meet the requirements and are passionate about the DevOps role, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume!
,[AOSP Development, Contribute on AAOSP projecte development, Building emulator image for multi platforms (X86_64, ARM or cloud, based any other).]

Requirements: Yocto, AOSP, Automotive, Android, Java, Kotlin, C++, Python
Tools: Jira.
Additionally: Sport subscription, Training budget, Private healthcare, Small teams, International projects, Free coffee, Canteen, Playroom, Shower, In-house trainings, In-house hack days, Modern office, Startup atmosphere, No dress code.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Poland, Spain, United Kingdom, Germany, Ireland

About ElevenLabs:

We are a growth-stage startup building the most advanced AI voice models and AI voice products (text to speech, audiobooks creation, dubbing, and the voice library).

We launched in January 2023 and have since reached over 1 million users and partnered with the world’s largest publishers (The New Yorker, The Washington Post, The Atlantic), media companies (Super Hi-Fi, D-ID, Futuri), and gaming studios (Paradox, Cloud Imperium Games, Don’t Nod). We are backed by the leading names in tech and AI (Nat Fridman, Daniel Gross, Andreessen Horowitz, Instagram co-founder Mike Krieger, Oculus VR co-founder Brendan Iribe, Deepmind & Inflection co-founder Mustafa Suleyman, and many others).

Join us in shaping the future of voice technology.

About the Role:

We are looking for an experienced Android developer to join our growing mobile team to spearhead high-impact projects in the audio AI space. Your role will include the delivery of new features to our reader app, ensuring seamless integration with our AI-driven audio functionalities. As part of our dynamic team, you will have the opportunity to identify pivotal areas where strategic initiatives or incremental efforts can drive significant impact.

We value engineers who are impact-driven, autonomous, and adept at discerning crucial insights from experimental results.

A strong background in native Android development with a proven track record is required.

In this role, you will:
• Drive the development of innovative features in our reader app through a combination of data analysis, product ideation, and experimentation to optimize user experiences.
• Plan and deploy mobile platform infrastructure necessary to build, test, and deploy these product experiences.
• Collaborate closely with design, product, research, and data science teams to achieve product goals.
• Contribute to the architecture and technical direction of the app.
• Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application.
• Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices and coding standards.
• Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

Looking ahead, you will also play a key role in creating a new, confidential project within the audio AI space, leveraging your expertise to shape its success.

You might thrive in this role if you:
• Have shipped features on Android that optimize user experiences and drive engagement.
• Are highly analytical and have experience designing and implementing A/B tests, with a scientific approach to data-based experiments.
• Have a voracious and intrinsic desire to learn and fill in missing skills, and an equally strong talent for sharing that information clearly and concisely with others.
• Are comfortable with ambiguity and rapidly changing conditions, viewing changes as an opportunity to add structure and order when necessary.
• Are located between GMT+3 and GMT -7

This is an exciting opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and make a significant impact on the future of audio AI applications.

What we offer:
• Stock options; we want you to have ownership in the company and share the successes that lie ahead. That’s why we offer early employees stock options as part of their compensation package.
• Remote-first; we look at who you are rather than where you live. That’s why we are growing across the globe and support your preferred location.
• Huge impact; there’s no endless iteration on the same small detail. You’ll own huge chunks of our app, and ship features impacting millions of users.
• Extraordinary team; we favor ambitious, smart people striving for outsized impact. You’ll work on the state of the art surrounded by people with extraordinary skills and positive attitudes.
• We offer competitive compensation and are open to candidates from mid - to staff level. Given the broad range, we'll be happy to discuss specific salary details during our initial conversation.
• Bi-annual company off-sites; the last two were in Portugal and Switzerland. Next stop: Croatia!

This offer from "ElevenLabs" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 78% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer - financial industry
jobs_results.description:
Expected, Android, Kotlin, Android Studio tools, Coroutines, Dagger, Hilt, MVI architecture, MVVM

About the project, Are you a talented Senior Android Developer passionate about building high-quality mobile applications? Do you thrive in a collaborative environment where innovation and excellence are valued? Are you ready to work with a leading global financial institution shaping the future of banking technology? If so, we want to hear from you!, We are currently seeking a skilled Senior Android Developer to join our team and work with our prestigious client. In this role, you will develop cutting-edge mobile applications that enhance the digital banking experience. This is a fantastic opportunity to leverage your technical expertise and contribute to impactful projects in the financial services industry. Please note: this role requires working from the client’s office in Kraków 4-5 times monthly.

Your responsibilities, Designing and implementing mobile applications for the Android platform, Developing new functionalities using Kotlin/Java, Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design innovative solutions, Ensuring high-quality, clean, and maintainable code, Testing developed functionalities to maintain reliability, Creating project documentation in compliance with industry standards

Min. 5 years of experience in developing mobile applications for the Android platform, Excellent knowledge of Kotlin and Android Studio tools, Strong understanding of Coroutines, Dagger/Hilt, Familiarity with Android Jetpack components, Solid experience with MVI architecture, MVVM, and Clean Architecture, Proven expertise in user interface design patterns and principles, Good knowledge of spoken and written English to communicate effectively, Willingness to work on-site in Kraków 4-5 times per month

What we offer, Great Place to Work since 2015 - it’s thanks to feedback from our workers that we get this special title and constantly implement new ideas, Employment stability - revenue of PLN 2.1BN, no debts, since 2006 on the market, We share the profit with Workers - over PLN 60M has already been allocated for this aim since 2022, Attractive benefits package - private healthcare, benefits cafeteria platform, car discounts and more, Comfortable workplace – class A offices or remote work, Dozens of fascinating projects for prestigious brands from all over the world – you can change them thanks to Job Changer application, PLN 1 000 000 per year for your ideas - with this amount, we support the passions and voluntary actions of our workers, Investment in your growth – meetups, webinars, training platform and technology blog – you choose, Fantastic atmosphere created by all Sii Power People

Recruitment stages, Send your CV , Talk to us about your expectations , Learn more about our projects and choose the best , Start your adventure with Sii!

Sii Sp. z o.o., Sii is the leading technology consulting, digital transformation, engineering, and business services vendor in Poland. We already employ more than 7 500 professionals and implement projects in a variety of industries for clients from many countries around the world., , The Great Place to Work title, won 10 times in a row, proves that at Sii we create a friendly work environment. In a survey, as many as 90% of our employees responded that Sii is a great place to work, and 95% of them think we have a great atmosphere here.

This is how we work,

jobs_results.title: Computer Scientist (m/f/d) as App Developer for iOS / Android
jobs_results.description:
Computer Scientist (m/f/d) as App Developer for iOS / Android
RIWA - All geoinformation becomes a digital experience

RIWA GmbH is a leading company in the field of geoinformation and municipal specialist processes with over 25 years of experience and market leader in Bavaria. Our team develops innovative solutions for the digital transformation of cities and municipalities, in particular through geographic information systems (GIS). We also create digital twins of municipalities for construction planning, energy management and sustainable urban development. We offer customized solutions and attach great importance to close cooperation.

Become part of our team in one of our branches in Augsburg, Memmingen or Kempten im AllgÃ¤u. After training, you can also work from home.
These are your tasks
• Further development of our native RIWA GIS Android app
• Implementation of our previous apps for Apple iOS with Kotlin & Compose Multiplatform
• Quality assurance through code reviews, unit tests and automated test procedures
• Technical conceptualization of functional requirements from product management
• Advising product management on development issues
You know your way around this
• Completed studies in computer science or equivalent training
• Sound knowledge in the development of Android apps (Kotlin, Java, Android SDK). Basic knowledge of iOS development advantageous (Swift)
• Ideally experience with Jetpack Compose, Kotlin Multiplatform and Compose Multiplatform
• Expertise with automated tests, CI/CD processes and agile software development
• Knowledge of designing appealing user interfaces is a plus
• Independent working style, ability to work in a team and a high level of self-motivation
What we offer you
• A great team - #GernePerDu - and a varied job in the office and home office
• Attractive salary, 13 monthly salaries, capital-forming benefits and a performance bonus
• Family-friendly working time models with flexible working hours (flexitime)
• Corporate benefits such as a job bike, drinks flat rate or employee discounts with over 1,500 providers
• Intensive training in the field of activity and regular further training
• An exciting environment with varied tasks
• A secure, modern workplace close to the city center with future prospects
Have we piqued your interest?

Please send us your complete application documents directly online via our applicant management system, stating your salary expectations and the earliest possible starting date.
RIWA GmbH

An der NeumÃ¼hle 5, 87700 Memmingen
Everyone is welcome at RIWA. Diversity and equal opportunities are an integral part of our company. We see the uniqueness of each individual, and therefore the diversity of our teams, as the driving force behind our daily work and innovations. - We look forward to meeting you.
